value.0: Rogue magic user! The use of magic within city walls is prohibited! Present you Wizard's License immediately or face the consequences!
Then I'm afraid I have no option but to imprison you for unlicensed practicing of magic! Come with me.
I'm afraid that the Law is the Law and cannot be subverted for anyone - especially chaos-worshipping scum such as yourself! Move!
Oh, ok then. Just this once. But you have been warned! Get a license if you wish to practice magic.
Most local authorities can issue licenses on production of a Letter of Sponsorship from a respected magic user who is willing to take you on as an apprentice and vouch for your character.
Hmmmm. This seems to be in order. Well, please refrain from using magic within the confines of the city in future.

I see you have already been caught practicing magic within the city walls - if we catch you doing this again we will have no option but to tear up your Wizards License and throw you in gaol with all the other chaotic criminals! You have been warned!

I'm afraid the Law is the Law and cannot be subverted by anyone - you are now guilty of attempted bribery as well as unlawful use of magic. If you wish to avoid immediate arrest I must ask you to pay a fine of 100gp.
Then I'm afraid I must arrest you immediately. Come with me!
Thank you. Now please do not disrespect the law again!
Alright, well see that it doesn't. We'll be keeping a close eye on you in future.

I see we have already significantly reprimanded you for unauthorised use of magic in a city! I'm afraid I have no option but to tear up your license and throw you in gaol. I only hope you have good friends around you who can bail you out and swear to vouch for your good character - otherwise our own inquisition into your background may well unearth subversive sides to your personality that leave us no option but to burn you at the stake! Come with me.
No, I'm afraid this is too much to brook. You are clearly guilty and it is my duty to take you in for questioning. Are you coming?
Hmmmm. Alright, maybe just this once. But if we catch you at it again you'll be straight in that gaol, no questions asked!

So <FirstName>, we meet at last. You've caused the members of my order much distress in the past, and I secretly hoped that I would be the one who would get the chance to bring you in. Now my wishes have been granted. I sincerely hope you are not planning on coming quietly...
If I were you I would not presume to dictate terms of duty. Hold still.
I'm glad to hear it. Have at you!
But I don't have a wizard's license!
You'll never take me alive!!
<StartCheck>Persuade</Start> Look, I really am terribly sorry officer - it won't happen again I swear - please don't take my license and throw me in gaol!!
Ok officer.
Where can I get a license from?
Thank you very much officer, goodbye.
Ok, I'm coming.
<StartAction>Show Wizard's License</Start> Here it is, take a good look.
Ok officer.
Fair enough.
<StartCheck>Persuade</Start> Please, I really am very sorry - it was an honest mistake - it won't happen again I swear!
But I don't have that kind of money!
Oh, I'm really very sorry, here - please take it.
Thank you officer.
You'll never take me alive!!
<StartCheck>Persuade</Start> Look, I really am terribly sorry officer - it won't happen again I swear - please don't take my license and throw me in gaol!!
Thank you officer.
Ok, I'm coming.
Actually, I am planning on coming quietly. I surrender. Go-on, arrest me, it's your duty.
You'll never take me alive!!
